title: Intr Black Media Studies
description: Introduces scholarship in Black Media Studies (BMS), which studies the relationships among media, culture, and racial politics by and about people of African descent.

prerequisites: ENGL 1101 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and ENGL 1102 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
